thread.section_title: American Frame americanframe.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Frame americanframe.com | www.americanframe.com
thread.title: DM
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by DM

author: DM
title: DM
text:
I've been an American Frame customer almost since the company began.
The frames are excellent and the hardware is improved since the "old days". I am disappointed that the shipping has become quite expensive and is slow, in comparison to other online vendors. Hence, only 4 stars.
